                          int xPos,
                          int yPos,
                          boolean isOn)
        Draw a component that has a different representation based on isOn value
        Parameters:
        elemType - Component type from LCComponent with isOn (LED, SWITCH, BIT3_DISPLAY)
        xPos - coordinate X
        yPos - coordinate Y
        isOn - is the component in state ON or OFF

      • drawComponent

                          int xPos,
                          int yPos,
                          boolean isOn,
                          java.lang.String legend)
        Draw a component that has a different representation based on isOn value
        Parameters:
        elemType - Component type from LCComponent with isOn (LED, SWITCH)
        xPos - coordinate X
        yPos - coordinate Y
        isOn - is the component in state ON or OFF
        legend - Text to display below the component representation

      • drawComponent

        public void drawComponent(LCComponent elemType,
                          int xPos,
                          int yPos,
                          int value)
        Draw a component that accept an integer value - Used for a 3 bit Display
        Parameters:
        elemType - Component type from LCComponent BIT3_DISPLAY
        xPos - coordinate X
        yPos - coordinate Y
        value - Value to display on 3 bit display

      • drawComponent

                          int xPos,

                          java.lang.String legend)

        Parameters:

        xPos - coordinate X
        yPos - coordinate Y
        legend - Text to display below the component representation

      • drawWire

        public void drawWire(LCComponent elemTypeFrom,
                     int xFrom,
                     int yFrom,
                     LCComponent elemTypeTo,
                     int xTo,
                     int yTo,
                     LCInputPin pinNumberTo,
                     boolean isOn)
        Draw a connection (wire) between 2 components
        Parameters:
        elemTypeFrom - Component type from LCComponent that has an output pin
        xFrom - coordinate X of the output component
        yFrom - coordinate Y of the output component
        elemTypeTo - Component type from LCComponent that has at least one input pin
        xTo - coordinate X of the input component
        yTo - coordinate Y of the input component
        pinNumberTo - Connection pin of input component (PIN_A, PIN_B, ...)
        isOn - is the connection in state ON or OFF
